author: lundblad
msg: Follow-up to r16891.  Avoid printing error output when failing to execute
a command to stderr, but instead print it to the passed in error file.
(handle_child_process_error): Use the error file passed in via the pool,
and don't output anything if that is NULL.
(svn_io_start_cmd): Sett errfile as userdata in the pool.

author: dlr
msg: (add_dir_recursive): As we always filter out "." and ".." (and probably
should be calling a function which does this for us), do the filtering

author: kfogel
msg: Follow up to r17077: Use sizeof() instead of a hardcoded buffer length.

author: kfogel
msg: When an error doesn't have a custom message, just use the generic
message associated with its error code, instead of saying that no
further error information is available.  (Followup to r17034.)
